title: BRIEF-Nuverra Environmental Solutions Files For Offering Of Up To 10.45 Million Common Shares
text: March 16, 2018 / 9:12 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Nuverra Environmental Solutions Files For Offering Of Up To 10.45 Million Common Shares Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Nuverra Environmental Solutions Inc : * NUVERRA ENVIRONMENTAL SOLUTIONS INC FILES FOR OFFERING OF UP TO 10.45 MILLION COMMON SHARES BY SELLING STOCKHOLDERS - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2pf1zha ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
